head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COHN, KATE E. (NEE ISAACK)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COHN, KATE E. (NEE ISAACK)

block.p: COHN-Kate E. (nee Isaack), 94. On Thursday, May 24, 2001, of Rockville, Maryland, formerly of Elizabeth, NJ. Devoted wife of the late Heinz Cohn. Beloved mother of the late Warren I. Cohn. Dear sister of the late John L. Isaack, sister-in-law of Harriette Isaack. Mother-in-law of Rivca Cohn. Adored grandmother of Philip Cohn and Rachel Cohn. Also survived by a nephew, Fred Isaack, a niece Lilly Mac Vittie and 12 great nephews and nieces. Graveside service at Beth Israel Cemetery, Woodbridge, NJ on Sunday, May 27, 2001 at 1:00 PM. The Menorah Chapels at Millburn, 2950 Vaux Hall Road, Union, New Jersey.
